amendment.description: To provide a meaningful prescription drug benefit in Medicare that is available to all beneficiaries.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 294 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 55 - 44. Record Vote Number: 63.

Amendment SA 294 proposed by Senator Dorgan for Senator Graham FL. (consideration: CR S3973-3979; text: CR S3973-3974) To provide a meaningful prescription drug benefit in Medicare that is available to all beneficiaries.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 294 proposed by Senator Dorgan for Senator Graham FL.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 294 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 55 - 44. Record Vote Number: 63.
